troubleshooting.title: Error Processing Topics with Chunk and Copy-To Attribute

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: A topic marked with both chunk and copy-to attributes is missing from the PDF output and the following error appears in the Results view:[DOTX008E] File 'file:/D:/path/to/file.dita' does not exist or cannot be loaded.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The chunk processing is skipped by default and must be enabled.

steps-informal.p: Set the enable.chunk.processing parameter with value 'true' and run the DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS scenario again.
